database

Class DatabaseReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseAccessor
      • database.DatabaseReader

  • public class DatabaseReader
extends DatabaseAccessor
    Reads data from a database and puts it into objects. Read-only access.
    Author:
    Andi Gu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Course> courses 
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Student> students 
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Teacher> teachers 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseReader(java.lang.String databaseName, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Constructs new DatabaseReader object, initiates data needed to connect to the database, reads all data from the database

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatabaseReader

        public DatabaseReader(java.lang.String databaseName,
              java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
               throws java.sql.SQLException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Constructs new DatabaseReader object, initiates data needed to connect to the database, reads all data from the database
        Parameters:
        databaseName - Name of the database to connect to.
        username - Username of the user for the server.
        password - Password of the user for the server.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        void refresh()
       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Refreshes the objects stored by re-reading data from the database. To be used when database is updated with new data.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • fetchTable

        private java.sql.ResultSet fetchTable(java.sql.Connection connection,
                            java.lang.String tableName)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reads data from a table in the database specified.
        Parameters:
        connection - Connection to database from which to read data.
        tableName - Name of table from which to read data.
        Returns:
        ResultSet of the data in the given table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • makeStudentTeacherConnections

        private void makeStudentTeacherConnections()
                                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Connects the Student objects with the Teacher objects through CourseAssociation objects. Necessary because there are some circular references in the student and teacher objects.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        Getter for all Student objects.
